GK16mamkpb_u:2027: yuktaṃ kiṃ hitakartanaṃ nanu balābhāvaprasiddhātmanaḥ sāmarthyaṃ bhavataḥ purandaramatacchedaṃ vidhātuṃ kutaḥ // 352 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2028: abhaṅgaśleṣeṇa yathā aho kenedṛśī buddhirvāruṇā tava nirmitā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2029: triguṇā śrūyate buddhirna tu dārumayī kvacit // 353 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2030: kākvā yathā gurujanaparatantratayā dūrataraṃ deśamudyato gantum /
GK16mamkpb_u:2044: anekasya, arthāta vyañjanasya sakṛdekavāraṃ sādṛśyaṃ chekānuprāsaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2049: ekasya, apiśabdādanekasya vyajjanasya dvirbahukṛtvo vā sādṛśyaṃ vṛcyanuprāsaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2059: udāharaṇam apasāraya ghanasāraṃ kuru hāraṃ dūra eva kiṃ kamalaiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2063: etāstisro vṛttayaḥ, vāmanādīnāṃ mate vaidarbhīgauḍīpāñcālyākhyā rītayo matāḥ //
GK16mamkpb_u:2071: udāharaṇam yasya na savidhe dayitā davadahanastuhinadīdhitistasya /
GK16mamkpb_u:2077: sudhākaraḥ kva nu punaḥ kalaṅkavikalo bhavet // 358 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2081: ekasmin samāse bhinne vā samāse samāsāsamāsayorvā nāmnaḥ prātipadikasya na tu padasya sārūpyam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2090: anyeṣāmanarthakatve bhinnārthānāmiti na yujyate vaktum iti,
GK16mamkpb_u:2092: seti sarorasa ityādivailakṣaṇyena tenaiva krameṇa sthitā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2095: prathamo dvitīyādau dvitīyastṛtīyādau tṛtīyaśvaturthe prathamastriṣvapīti sapta /
GK16mamkpb_u:2096: prathamo dvitīye tṛtīyaśvaturthe prathamaśvaturthe dvitīyastṛtīye, iti dve /
GK16mamkpb_u:2099: dvidhā vibhakte pāde prathamādipādādibhāgaḥ pūrvavat dvitīyādipādādibhāgeṣu,
GK16mamkpb_u:2100: antabhāgo 'ntabhāgeṣviti viṃśatirbedāḥ ślokāntare hi nāsau bhāgāvṛttiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2105: madhyāṃdikam ādipadhyam antamadhyam madhyāntikaṃ teṣāṃ samuccayaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2120: yā ca māteva bhajate praṇate mānave dayām // 364 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2122: śivehitāṃ śive hitāṃ smarāmitāṃ smarāmi tām // 365 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2135: iti ca naye vācyabhedena bhinnā api śabdā yat yugapaduccāraṇena śliṣyanti bhinnaṃ svarūpamapahnuvate sa śleṣaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2137: krameṇodāharaṇam-- alaṃkāraḥ śaṅkākaranarakapālaṃ parijano viśīrṇāṅgo bhṛṅgī vasu ca vṛṣa eko bahuvayāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2138: avastheyaṃ sthāṇorapi bhavati sarvāmaraguro- rvidhau vakre mūrdhni sthitavati vayaṃ ke punaramī // 369 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2142: lāvaṇyasya mahānidhī rasikatāṃ lakṣmīdṛśostanvatī yuṣmākaṃ kurutāṃ bhavārtiśamanaṃ netre tanurvā hareḥ // 371 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2146: ayaṃ sarvāṇi śāstrāṇi hṛdi jñeṣu ca vakṣyati /
GK16mamkpb_u:2149: pramathanivahamadhye jātucicvatprasādādahamucitaruciḥ syānnanditā sā tathā me // 374 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2159: ucyate--iha doṣaguṇālaṃkārāṇāṃ śabdārthagatatvena yo vibhāgaḥ saḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2165: iti sabhaṅgaḥ iti dvāvapi śabdaikasamāśrayāviti dvayorapi śabdaśleṣatvamupapannam na tvādyasyārthaśleṣatvam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2166: arthaśleṣasya tu sa viṣayaḥ, yatra śabdaparivartane 'pi na śleṣatvakhaṇḍanā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2169: na cāyamupamāpratibhotpattihetuḥ śleṣaḥ, api tu śleṣapratibhotpattiheturupamā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2170: tathāhi--yathā “kamalamiva mukhaṃ manojñametatkacatitarām'; ityādau guṇasāmye kriyāsāmye,
GK16mamkpb_u:2178: ityādiḥ sādhāraṇadharmaprayogaśūnya upamāviṣaya iti vaktuṃ yuktam pūrṇopamāyā nirviṣayatvāpatteḥ //
GK16mamkpb_u:2183: upapattiparyālocane tu, upamāyā evāyaṃ yukto viṣayaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2185: na ca “abindusundarī nityaṃ galallāvaṇyabindukā'; ityādau virodhapratibhotpattihetuḥ śleṣaḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2187: na hyatrārthadvayapratipādakaḥ śabdaśleṣaḥ, dvitīyārthasya pratibhātamātrasya prarohābhāvāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:2188: na ca virodhābāsa iva virodhaḥ śleṣābhāsaḥ śleṣaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2191: nālpaḥ kaviriva svalpaśloko deva mahān bhavān // 381 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2197: śabda śleṣa iti cocyate, arthālaṃkāramadhye ca lakṣyate, iti ko 'yaṃ nayaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2198: kiṃ ca vaicitryamalaṃkāra iti ya eva kavipratibhāsaṃrambhagocarastatraiva vicitratā,
GK16mamkpb_u:2200: arthamusvaprekṣitvameteṣāṃ śabdānāmiti cet anuprāsādīnāmapi tathaiveti te 'pyarthālaṃkārāḥ kiṃ necyante /
GK16mamkpb_u:2208: saṃniveśaviśeṣeṇa yatra nyastā varṇāḥ khaḍgamurajapajhādyākāramullāsayanti taccitraṃ kāvyam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2213: mānyātha sīmā rāmāṇāṃ śaṃ me diśyādumādimā // 385 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2217: bhāvitātmā śubhā vāde devābhā bata te sabhā // 387 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2221: saṃbhavino 'pyante prabhedāḥ śaktimātraprakāśakā na tu kāvyarūpatāṃ dadhatīti na pradarśyante //
GK16mamkpb_u:2237: atraiksamin pade parivartiṃte nālaṃkāra iti śabdāśrayaḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2240: iti kāvyaprakāśe śabdālaṃkāranirṇayo nāma navama ullāsaḥ //
GK16mamkpb_u:2245: upamānopameyayoreva na tu kāryakāraṇādikayoḥ sādharmyaṃ bhavatīti tayoreva samānena dharmeṇa saṃbandha upamā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2252: śrautyārthī ca bhavedvākye samāse taddhite tathā //87//
GK16mamkpb_u:2253: yathevavādiśabdā yatparāstasyaivopamānatāpratītiriti yadyapyumānaviśeṣaṇānyete tathāpi śabdaśaktimahimnā śrutyaiva ṣaṣṭhīvat saṃbandaṃ pratipādayantīti tatsadbhāve śrautī, upamā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2258: ityubhayatrāpi tulyādiśabdānāṃ viśrāntiriti sāmyaparyālocanayā tulyatāpratītiriti sādharmyasyārthatvāttulyādiśabdopādāne,
GK16mamkpb_u:2259: ārthī tadvat “tena tulyaṃ kriyā cedvatiḥ'; ityanena vihitasya vateḥ sthitau /
GK16mamkpb_u:2260: “ivena nityasamāso vibhaktyalopaḥ pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvaṃ ca” iti nityasamāse,
GK16mamkpb_u:2262: krameṇodāharaṇam-- svapne 'pi samareṣu tvāṃ vijayaśrīrna muñcati /
GK16mamkpb_u:2265: sarasijamidamānanaṃ ca tasyāḥ samamiti cetasi saṃmadaṃ vidhatte // 393 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2267: śaurirbhujairiva caturbhiradaḥ sadā yo lakṣmīvilāsabhavanairbhuvanaṃ babhāra // 394 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2269: suratarusadṛśaḥ sa bhavānabhilaṣaṇīyaḥ kṣitīśvara na kasya // 395 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2273: tathā jayaśrīstvadāsevanenetyādinā pratīyamānena vinā yadyapi noktervaicitryam,
GK16mamkpb_u:2276: na khalu vyaṅgyasaṃsparśaparāmarśādatra cārutāpratītiḥ, api tu vācyavaicitryapratibhāsādeva /
GK16mamkpb_u:2277: rasādistu vyaṅgyo 'rtho 'laṃkārāntaraṃ ca sarvatrāvyabhicārītyagaṇayitvaiva tadalaṃkārā udāhṛtāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2278: tadrahitatvena tu, udāhriyamāṇā virasatāmāvahantīti pūrvāparaviruddhābhidhānamiti na codanīyam //
GK16mamkpb_u:2280: tadvat dharmasya lope syāt na śrautī taddhite punaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2284: udāharaṇam-- dhanyasyānanyasāmānyasaujanyotkarṣaśālinaḥ karaṇīyaṃ vacaśvetaḥ satyaṃ tasyāmṛtaṃ yathā // 397 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2288: viṣakalpaṃ mano vetsi yadi jīvasi tatsakhe // 399 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2292: dīsai aha va ṇisammai sarisaṃ aṃsaṃsametteṇa // 400 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2293: kavvassetyatra kavvasamamiti sarisamityatra ca ṇūṇamiti pāṭhe, eṣaiva samāsagā //
GK16mamkpb_u:2298: upamādyotaka iti vāderupamāpratipādakasya lope ṣaṭ samāsena sarmaṇo 'dhikaraṇāccotpannena kyacā kartuḥ kyaṅā karmakartrorupapadayorṇamulā ca bhavet //
GK16mamkpb_u:2303: pairaṃ sutīyati janaṃ samarāntare 'sāvantaḥ purīyati vicitracaritracuñcuḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2304: nārīyate samārasīmni kṛpāṇapāṇerālokya tasya caritāni sapatnasenā // 403 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2310: udāharaṇam-- savitā vidhavati vidhurapi savitarati tathā dinanti yāminyaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2330: atra saptamyupamānetyādinā yadā samāsalopau bhavataḥ, tadedamudāharaṇam //
GK16mamkpb_u:2336: ityabhinne sādhāraṇe dharme, jyotsneva nayanānandaḥ sureva madakāraṇam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2338: iti bhenne ca tasmin ekasyaiva bahūpamānopādāne mālopamā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2343: tasya sabheva jayaśrīḥ śakyā jetuṃ nṛpasya na pareṣām // 413 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2344: ityādikā raśanopamā ca na lakṣitā, evaṃvidhavaicitryasahasrasaṃbhavāt uktabhedānatikramācca //
GK16mamkpb_u:2349: udāharaṇam-- na kevalaṃ bhāti nitāntakāntirniṃtambinī saiva nitambinīva /
GK16mamkpb_u:2356: udāharaṇam-- kamaleva matirmatiriva kamalā tanuriva vibhā vibheva tanuḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2357: dharaṇīva dhṛcirdhṛtiriva dharaṇī satataṃ vibhāti bata yasya // 415 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2361: udārahaṇam-- unmeṣaṃ yo mama na sahate jātivairī niśāyām intorintīvaradaladṛśā tasya saundaryadarpaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2362: nītaḥ śāntiṃ prasabhamanayā vaktrakāntyeti harṣā- llagrā manye lalitatanu te pādayoḥ pajhalakṣmīḥ // 416 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2368: bhedīktau yathā ayaṃ mārtaṇḍaḥ kiṃ sa khalu turagaiḥ saptabhiritaḥ kṛśānuḥ kiṃ sarvāḥ prasarati diśo naiṣa niyatam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2369: kṛtāntaḥ kiṃ sākṣānmahiṣavahano 'sāviti ciraṃ samālokyājau tvāṃ vidadhati vikalpān pratibhaṭāḥ // 418 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2370: bhedhoktāvityanena na kevalamayaṃ niśvayagarbho yāvannisvayānto 'pi saṃdehaḥ svīkṛtaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2371: yathā induḥ kiṃ kva kalaṅkaḥ sarasijametat kimambu kutra gatam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2373: kiṃ tu niśvayagarbha iva nātra niśvayaḥ pratīyamāna iti, upekṣito bhaṭṭodbhaṭena /
GK16mamkpb_u:2374: tadanuktau yathā asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatirabhūccandro nu kāntipradaḥ śṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svayaṃ nu madano māso nu puṣpākaraḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2375: vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ nu viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ // 420 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2385: yathā jyotsnābhasmacchuraṇadavalā bibhratī tārakāsthī- nyantardhānavyasanarasikā rātrikāpālikīyam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2386: dvīpāddvīpaṃ bhramati dadhatī candarmudrākapāle nyastaṃ siddhāñjanaparimalaṃ lāñchanasya cchalena // 421 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2388: antardhānavyasanarasikatvamāropitadharma eveti rūpakaparigrahe sādhakamastīti tatsaṃkarāśaṅkā na kāryā //
GK16mamkpb_u:2392: yathā jassa raṇanteurae kare kuṇantassa maṇḍalaggalaam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2393: rasasaṃmuhī vi sahasā paraṃmuhī hoi riuseṇā // 422 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2394: atra raṇasyāntaḥpuratvamāropyamāṇaṃ śabdopātm maṇḍalāgralatāyāḥ nāyikātvam ripusenāyāśva pratināyikātvam arthasāmarthyādavasīyate,
GK16mamkpb_u:2402: yathā kuraṅgīvāṅgāni stimitayati gītadhvaniṣu yat sakhīṃ kāntodantaṃ śrutamapi punaḥ praśrayati yat /
GK16mamkpb_u:2403: anidraṃ yaccāntaḥ svapiti tadaho vedmyabhinavāṃ pravṛtto 'syāḥ sektuṃ hṛdi manasijaḥ premalatikāma // 423 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2407: yathā saundaryasya taraṅgiṇī taruṇimotkarṣasya harṣodgamaḥ kānteḥ kārmaṇakarma narmarahasāmullāsanāvāsabhūḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2408: vidyā vakragirāṃ vidheranavadhiprāvīṇyasākṣātkriyā bāṇāḥ pañcaśilīmukhasya lalanācūḍāmaṇiḥ sā priyā // 424 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2411: tat paraṃparitaṃ śliṣṭe vācake bhedabhāji vā //95//
GK16mamkpb_u:2413: satyaprītividhānadakṣa vijayaprāgbhāvabhīma prabho sāmrājyaṃ varavīra vatsaraśataṃ vairiñcamuccaiḥ kriyāḥ // 425 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2414: atra mānasameva mānasam kamalāyāḥ saṃkoca eva kamalānāmasaṃkocaḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2415: durgāṇāmamārgaṇameva durgāyāḥ mārgaṇam samitāṃ svīkāra eva samidhāṃ svīkāraḥ satye prītireva satyāmaprītiḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2418: yadyapi śabdārthālaṃkāro 'yamityuktam vakṣyate ca tathāpi prasiddhyanurodhādatroktaḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2420: bhedabhāji yathā ālānaṃ jayakuñjarasya dṛṣadāṃ seturvipadvāridheḥ pūrvādriḥ karavālacaṇḍhamahaso līlopadhānaṃ śriyaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2421: saṃgrāmāmṛtasāgarapramathanakrīḍāvidau mandaro rājan rājati vīravairivanitāvaidhavyadasate bhujaḥ // 426 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2422: atra jayoderbhinnaśabdavācyasya kujjaratvādyārope bhujasya, ālānatvādyāropo yujyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:2425: niravadhi ca nirāśrayaṃ ca yasya sthitamanivartitakautukaprapañcam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2426: prathama iha bhavān sa kūrmamūrtirjayati caturdaśalokavallikandaḥ // 428 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2430: ityādi raśanārūpakaṃ na vaicitryavaditi na lakṣitam //
GK16mamkpb_u:2433: upameyam asatyaṃ kṛtvopamānaṃ satyatayā yat sthāpyate sā tu, apahnutiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2434: udāharaṇam-- avāptaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ pariṇatarucaḥ śailatanaye kalaṅko naivāyaṃ vilasati śaśāhkasya vapuṣi /
GK16mamkpb_u:2435: amuṣyeyaṃ manye vigaladamṛtasyantaśiśire ratiśrāntā śete rajaniramaṇī gāḍhamurasi // 430 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2436: itthaṃ vā bata sakhi kiyadetat paśya vairaṃ smarasya priyavirahakṛśe 'smin rāgiloke tathā hi /
GK16mamkpb_u:2438: atra hi na sabhṛṅgāṇi sahakārāṇi, api tu sakālakūṭāḥ śarā iti pratītiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2439: evaṃ vā amuṣmiṃllāvaṇyāmṛtasarasi nūnaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ smaraḥ śarvapluṣṭaḥ pṛṣujaghanabhāge nipatitaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2440: yadaṅgāṅgārāṇāṃ pratamapiśunā nābhikuhare śikhā dhūmasyeyaṃ pariṇamati romāvalivapuḥ // 432 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2444: śleṣaḥ sa vākye, ekasmin yatrānekārthatā bhavet //96//
GK16mamkpb_u:2446: udāharaṇam-- udayamayate diṅbhālinyaṃ nirākurutetarām nayati nidhanaṃ nidrāmudrāṃ pravartayati kriyāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2447: racayatitarāṃ svairācārapravartanakartanam vata bata lasattejaḥpuñjo vibhāti vibhākaraḥ // 433 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2451: prakṛtārthapratipādakavākyena śliṣṭaviśeṣaṇamāhātmayāt na tu viśeṣyasya sāmarthyādapi yat aprakṛtasyārthasyābhidhānam sā samāsena saṃkṣepeṇārthadvayakathanāt samāsoktiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2452: udāharaṇam--lahiūṇa tujjha bāhuphphaṃsaṃ jīe sa ko vi ullāso /
GK16mamkpb_u:2453: jaalacchī tuha virahe ṇa hūjjalā dubbalā ṇaṃ sā // 434 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2459: udāharaṇam-- kvasūryaprabhavo vaṃśaḥ kva cālpaviṣayā matiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2461: atra, uḍupena sāgarataraṇamiva manmatyā sūryavaṃśavarṇanamityupamāyāṃ paryavasyati /
GK16mamkpb_u:2462: yathā vā udayati vitatordhvaraśmirajjāvahimarucau himadhāmni yāti cāstam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2464: atra kathamanyasya līlāmanyo vahatīti tatsadṛśīmityupamāyāṃ paryavasānam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2466: meruṃ lilaṅghayiṣati dhruvameṣa deva yaste guṇān gaditumudyamamādadhāti // 437 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2470: kriyayaiva svasvarūpasvakāraṇayoḥ saṃbandho yadavagamyate sā, aparā nidarśanā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2471: yathā unnataṃ padamavāpya yo laghurhelayaiva sa patediti bruvan /
GK16mamkpb_u:2473: atra pātakriyayā patanasya lāghave sati, unnatapadaprāptirūpasya ca saṃbandhaḥ khyāpyate //
GK16mamkpb_u:2478: kārye nimitte sāmānye viśeṣe prastute sati /
GK16mamkpb_u:2481: krameṇodāharaṇam-- yātā kiṃ na milanti sundari punaśvintā tvayā matkṛte no kāryā nitarāṃ kṛśāsi kathayatyevaṃ sabāṣpe mayi /
GK16mamkpb_u:2482: lajjāmantharatārakeṇa nipatatpītāśruṇā cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā māṃ hasitena bhāvimaraṇotsāhastayā sūcitaḥ // 439 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2483: atra prasthānātkimiti nivṛtto 'sīti kārye pṛṣṭe kāraṇamabhihitam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2484: rājantarājasutā na pāṭhayati māṃ devyo 'pi tūṣṇīṃ sthitāḥ kubje bhojaya māṃ kumārasacivairnādyāpi kiṃ bhujyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:2485: ityaṃ nātha śukastāvāribhavane mukto 'dhvagaiḥ pañjarāt citrasthānavalokya śūnyavalabhāvekaikamābāṣate // 440 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2486: atra prasthānodyataṃ bhavantaṃ jñātvā sahasaiva tvadarayaḥ palāyya gatāḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2488: etattasya mukhātkiyat kamalinīpatre kaṇaṃ vāriṇo yanmuktāmaṇirityamaṃsta sa jaḍaḥ śṛṇvanyadasmādapi /
GK16mamkpb_u:2489: aṅgulyagralaghukriyāpravilayinyādīyamāne śanaiḥ kutroḍḍīya gato mametyanudinaṃ nidrāti nāntaḥśucā // 441 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2490: atrāsthāne jaḍānāṃ mamatvasaṃbhāvanā bhavatīti sāmānye prastute viśeṣaḥ kathitaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2492: sa eva pūjyaḥ sa pumānsa nītimānsujīvitaṃ tasya sa bhājanaṃ śriyaḥ // 442 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2493: atra “kṛṣṇaṃ nihatya narakāsuravadhūnāṃ yadi duḥkhaṃ praśamayasi tat tvameva ślāghyaḥ';
GK16mamkpb_u:2496: śleṣaḥ samāsoktiḥ sādṛśyamātraṃ vā tulyāt tulyasya hyākṣepe hetuḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2497: krameṇodāharaṇam-- puṃstvādapi pravicalet yadi yadyadho 'pi yāyāt yadi praṇayane namahānapi syāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:2498: abhyuddharettadapi viśvamitīdṛśīyaṃ kenāpi dik prakaṭitā puruṣottamena // 443 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2499: yenāsyabhyuditena candra gamitaḥ klāntiṃ ravau tatra te yujyeta pratikartumeva na punastasyaiva pādagrahaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2500: kṣīṇenaitadanuṣṭhitaṃ yadi tataḥ kiṃ lajjase no manāg astvenaṃ jaḍadhāmatā tu bhavato yad vyāmni visphūrjase // 444 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2501: ādāya vāri paritaḥ saritāṃ mukhebhyaḥ kiṃ tāvadarjitamanena durarṇavena /
GK16mamkpb_u:2502: kṣārīkṛtaṃ ca vaḍavādahane hutaṃ ca pātālakukṣikuhare viniveśitaṃ ca // 445 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2503: iyaṃ ca kācit vācye pratīyamānārthānadhyāropeṇaiva bhavati /
GK16mamkpb_u:2504: yathā abdherambhaḥ sthagitabhuvanābogapātālakukṣeḥ potopāyā iha hi bahavo laṅghane 'pi kṣamante /
GK16mamkpb_u:2505: āho riktaḥ kathamapi bhavedeṣa daivāt tadānīṃ ko nāma syādavaṭakuharālokane 'pyasya kalpaḥ // 446 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2507: yathā kastvaṃ bhoḥ kathayāmi daivahatakaṃ māṃ viddhi śākhoṭakaṃ vairāgyādiva vakṣi sādhu viditaṃ kasmādidaṃ kathyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:2508: vāmenātra vaṭastamadhvagajanaḥ sarvātmanā sevate na cchāyāpi paropakārakaraṇe mārgasthitasyāpi me // 447 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2510: yathā so 'pūrvo rasanāviparyayavidhiḥ tat karṇayośvāpalaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sā madavismṛtasvaparadik kiṃ bhūyakoktena vā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2511: sarvaṃ vismṛtavānasi bhramara he yadvāraṇo 'dyāpyasau antaḥśūnyakaro niṣevyata iti bhrātaḥ ka eṣa grahaḥ // 448 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2512: atra rasanāviparyāsaḥ śūnyakaratvaṃ ca bhramarasyāsevane na hetuḥ karṇacāpalaṃ tu hetuḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:2520: yathā kamalamanambhasi kamale ca kuvalaye tāni kanakalatikāyām /
GK16mamkpb_u:2524: yathā aṇṇaṃ laḍahattaṇaaṃ aṇṇā via kā vi vattaṇacchāā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2525: sāmā sāmaṇṇapaāvaiṇo reha ccia ṇa hoī // 450 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2527: uktau yat kalpanam (arthāt asaṃbhavino 'rthasya) sā tṛtīyā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2530: kāraṇasya śīghrakāritāṃ vaktuṃ kāryasya pūrvamuktau caturthī /
GK16mamkpb_u:2538: upamānavākye ca kathitapadasya duṣṭatayābhihitatvāt śabdabhedena yat upādīyate sā vastuno vākyārthasyopamānatvāt prativastūpamā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2539: yathā devībhāvaṃ gamitā parivārapadaṃ kathaṃ bhajatveṣā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2541: yadi dahatyanalo 'tra kimadbhutaṃ yadi ca gauravamadriṣu kiṃ tataḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2547: eteṣāṃ sādhāraṇadharmādīnāma dṛṣṭo 'ntaḥ niśvayo yatra sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2548: tvayi dṛṣṭa eva tasyā nirvāti mano manobhavajvalitam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2551: vaidharmyeṇa tu tavāhave sāhasakarmaśarmaṇaḥ karaṃ kṛpāṇāntikamāninīṣataḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2552: bhaṭāḥ pareṣāṃ viśarārutāmaguḥ, dadhatyavāte sthiratāṃ hi pāṃsavaḥ // 456 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2557: ekavārameva yat upādīyate tat ekasthasyaiva samastavākyadīpanāt dīpakam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2558: yathā kivaṇāṇaṃ dhaṇaṃ ṇāāṇaṃ phaṇamaṇī keśarāiṃ sīhāṇaṃ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2561: yathā svidyati kūṇati vellati vicalati nimiṣati vilokayati tiryak /
GK16mamkpb_u:2565: pūveṃṇa pūrveṇa vastunā, uttaramuttaraṃ cedupakriyate tat mālādīpakam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2566: yathā saṃgrāmāṅgaṇamāgatena bhavatā cāpe samāropite devākarṇaya yena yena sahasā yadyatsamāsāditam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2567: kodaṇḍena śarāḥ śarairariśirastenāpi bhūmaṇḍalaṃ tena tvaṃ bhavatā ca kīrtiratulā kīrtyā ca lokatraḍalaṃ tena tvaṃ bhavatā ca kīrtiratulā kīrtyā ca lokatrayam // 459 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2571: krameṇodāharaṇam-- pāṇḍu kṣāmaṃ vadanaṃ hṛdayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca vapuḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2578: kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇo 'pi śaśī bhūyo bhūyo 'bhivardhate satyam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2579: virama prasīda sundari yauvanamanivarti yātaṃ tu // 462 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2580: ityādānupamānasyopameyādādhikyamiti kenaciduktam tadayuktam atra yauvanagatāsthairyādhikyaṃ hi vivakṣitam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2589: ākṣipte caupamye tāvanta eva, evaṃ dvādaśa /
GK16mamkpb_u:2593: atraiva tuccheti mahādhṛterityanayoḥ paryāyeṇa yugapadvānupādāne 'nyat bhedatrayam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2613: atra tulyārthe vatiḥ viṣamādayaśva śabdāḥ śliṣṭāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2618: yūnāmatīva pibatāṃ rajanīṣu yatra tṛṣṇāṃ jahāra madhu nānanamaṅganānām // 470 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2619: atrevādīnāṃ tulyādīnāṃ ca padānāmabhāve 'pi śliṣṭaviśeṣaṇairākṣiptaivopamā pratīyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:2620: evaṃjātīyakāḥ śliṣṭoktiyogyasya padasya pṛthagupādāne 'nye 'pi bhedāḥ saṃbhavanti /
GK16mamkpb_u:2626: aśakyavaktavyatvamatiprasiddhatvaṃ vā viśeṣaṃ vaktuṃ niṣedho niṣedha iva yaḥ sa vakṣyamāṇaviṣaya uktaviṣayaśveti dvidhā, ākṣepaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2627: krameṇodāharaṇam-- e ehi kiṃpi kīevi kaeṇa ṇikviva bhaṇāmi alamaha vā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2629: jyotsnā mauktikadāma candanarasaḥ śītāṃśukāntadravaḥ karpūraṃ kadalī mṛṇālavalayānyambhojinīpallavāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2630: anyarmānasamāstvayā prabhavatā tasyāḥ sphuliṅgotkara- vyāpārāya bhavanti inta hanta kimanenoktena na brūmahe // 472 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2640: krameṇodārahaṇam-- nidrānivṛttāvudite dyuratne sakhījane dvārapadaṃ parāpte /
GK16mamkpb_u:2642: karpūra iva dagdho 'pi śaktimān yo jane jane /
GK16mamkpb_u:2645: haratāpi tanuṃ yasya śaṃbhunā na balaṃ hṛtam // 476 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2648: yathā ekastridhā vasasi cetasi citramatra deva dviṣāṃ ca viduṣāṃ ca mṛgīdṛśāṃ ca /
GK16mamkpb_u:2649: tāpaṃ ca saṃmadarasaṃ ca ratiṃ ca puṣṇan śauryoṣmaṇā ca vinayena ca līlayā ca // 477 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2651: sāmānyaṃ vā viśeṣo vā tadanyena samarthyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:2653: sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā sāmānyaṃ viśeṣeṇa yat samarthyate viśeṣo vā sāmānyena so 'rthāntaranyāsaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2656: susitavasanālaṃkārāyāṃ kadācana kaumudī- mahasi sudṛśi svairaṃ yāntyāṃ gato 'stamabhūdvidhuḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2657: tadanu bhavataḥ kīrtiḥ kenāpyagīyata yena sā priyagṛhamagānmuktāśaṅkā kva nāsi śubhapradaḥ // 479 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2660: aho hi me bahvaparāddhamāyuṣā yadapriyaṃ vācyamidaṃ mayedṛśam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2661: ta eva dhanyāḥ suhṛdaḥ parābhavaṃ jagatyadṛṣṭvaiva hi ye kṣayaṃ gatāḥ // 481 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2667: kriyā dvābhyāmapi dravyaṃ dravyeṇaiveti te daśa /
GK16mamkpb_u:2672: yeṣāṃ kaṇṭhaparigrahapraṇayitāṃ saṃprāpya dhārādhara- stīkṣṇaḥ so 'pyanurajyate ca kamapi snehaṃ parāpnoti ca /
GK16mamkpb_u:2673: teṣāṃ saṃgarasahgasaktamanasāṃ rājñāṃ tvayā bhūpate pāṃsūnāṃ paṭalaiḥ praśādhanavidhirnirvartyate kautukam // 484 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2674: sṛjati ca jagadidamavati ca saṃharati ca helayaiva yo niyatam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2677: dvijapatnīnāṃ paṭhināḥ sati bhavati karāḥ sarojasukumārāḥ // 486 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2682: paricchedātītaḥ sakalavacanānāmaviṣayaḥ punarjanmanyasminnanubhavapathaṃ yo na gatavāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:2683: vivekapradhvaṃsādupacitamahāmohagahano vikāraḥ ko 'pyantarjaḍhayati ca tāpaṃ ca kurute // 489 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2684: ayaṃ vārāmekī nilaya iti ratnākara iti śrito 'smābhistṛṣṇātaralitamanobhirjalanidhiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2685: ka evaṃ jānīte nijakarapuṭīkoṭaragataṃ kṣaṇādenaṃ tāmyattimimakaramāpāsyati muniḥ // 490 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2692: udāharaṇam-- paśvādaṅghrī prasārya trikanativitataṃ drāghayitvāṅgamuccaiḥ āsajyābhugnakaṇṭho mukhamurasi saṭāṃ dhūlidhūmrāṃ vidhūya /
GK16mamkpb_u:2693: ghāsagrāsābhilāṣādanavaratacalatprothatuṇḍasturaṅgo mandaṃ śabdāyamāno vilakhati śayanādutthitaḥ kṣmāṃ khureṇa // 492 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2697: krameṇodāharaṇam-- hitvā tvāmuparodhavanadhyamanasāṃ manye na mauliḥ paro lajjāvarjanamantareṇa na ramāmanyatra saṃdṛśyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:2698: yastyāgaṃ tanutetarāṃ mukhaśatairetyāśritāyāḥ śriyaḥ prāpya tyāgakṛtāvamānanamapi tvayyeva yasyāḥ sthitiḥ // 493 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2699: he helājitabaudhisacva vacasāṃ kiṃ vistaraistoyadhe nāsti tvatsadṛśaḥ paraḥ parahitādhāne gṛhītavrataḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2703: ekārthābidhāyakamapi sahārthabalāt yat ubhayasyāpyavagamakaṃ sā sahoktiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2704: yathā saha diahaṇisāhiṃ dīharā sāsadaṇḍā saha maṇivalayehiṃ bāppadhārā galanti /
GK16mamkpb_u:2705: tuha suhaa vioe tīa uvviggirīe saha a taṇuladāe dubbalā jīvidāsā // 495 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2706: śvāsadaṇḍādigataṃ dīrgatvādi śābdam divasaniśādigataṃ tu sahārthasāmarthyātpratipadyate //
GK16mamkpb_u:2708: vinoktiḥ sā vinānyena yatrānyaḥ sanna netaraḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2710: krameṇodāharaṇam-- arucirniśayā vinā śaśī śaśinā sāpi vinā mahattamaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2711: ubhayena vinā manobhavasphuritaṃ naiva cakāsti kāminoḥ // 496 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2717: udāharaṇam-- latānāmetāsāmuditakusumānāṃ marudayaṃ mataṃ lāsyaṃ datvā śrayati bhṛśamāmodamasamam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2719: atra prathame 'rdhe samena samasya dvitīye, uttamena nyūnasya /
GK16mamkpb_u:2733: vākyārthatā yathā vapuḥprādurbhāvādanumitamidaṃ janmani purā purāre na prāyaḥ kvacidapi bhavantaṃ praṇatavān /
GK16mamkpb_u:2734: naman muktaḥ saṃpratyahamatanuragre 'pyanatibhāk maheśa kṣantavyaṃ tadidamaparādhadvayamapi // 501 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2735: anekapadārthatā yathā praṇayisakhīsalīlaparihāsarasādhigatai- rlalitaśirīṣapuṣpahananairapi tāmyati yat /
GK16mamkpb_u:2736: vapuṣi vadhāya tatra tava śastramupakṣipataḥ patatu śirasyakāṇḍayamadaṇḍa ivaiṣa bhujaḥ // 502 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2737: ekapadārthatā yathā bhasmoddhūlana bhadramastu bhavate rudrākṣamāle śubhaṃ hā sopānaparaṃparāṃ girisutākāntālayālaṃkṛtim /
GK16mamkpb_u:2738: adyārādhanatoṣitena vibhunā yuṣmatsaparyāsukhā- lokocchedini mokṣanāmani mahāmohe nidhīyāmahe // 503 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2749: airāvaṇaśakrau madamānamuktau jātāviti vyaṅgyamapi śabdenocyate tena yadevocyate tadeva vyaṅgyam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2751: yathā gavi śukle calati dṛṣṭe “gauḥ śuklaśvalati'; iti vikalpaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2752: yadeva dṛṣṭaṃ tadeva vikalpayati na tu yathā dṛṣṭaṃ tathā /
GK16mamkpb_u:2758: yathā muktāḥ kelivisūtrahāragalitāḥ saṃmārjanībhirhṛtāḥ prātaḥ prāṅgaṇasīmni mantharacaladbālāṅgrilākṣāruṇāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2759: dūrāddāḍimabījaśaṅkitadhiyaḥ karṣanti kelīśukāḥ yadvidvadbhavaneṣu bhojanṛpatestat tyāgalīlāyitam // 505 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2769: tasya prastutasya kāryasya, ekasmin sādhake sthite sādhakāntarāṇi yatra saṃbhavanti sa samuccayaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2770: udāharaṇam-- durvārāḥ smahamārgaṇāḥ priyatamo dūre mano 'tyutsukaṃ gāḍhaṃ preṇa navaṃ vayo 'tikaṭhināḥ prāṇāḥ kulaṃ nirmalam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2771: strītvaṃ dhairyavirodhi manmathasuhṛt kālaḥ kṛtānto 'kṣamo no sakhyaśvaturāḥ kathaṃ nu virahaḥ soḍhavya itthaṃ śaṭhaḥ // 507 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2772: atra virahāsahatvaṃ smaramārgaṇā eva kurvanti tadupari priyatamadūrasthityādi, upāttam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2773: eṣa eva samuccayaḥ sadyoge 'sadyoge sadasadyoge ca paryavasyatīti na pṛthaklakṣyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:2774: tathāhi-- kulamamalinaṃ bhadrā mūrtirmatiḥ śrutiśālinī bhujabalamalaṃ sphītā lakṣmīḥ prabhutvamakhaṇḍitam /
GK16mamkpb_u:2775: prakṛtisubhagā hyete bhāvā amībhirayaṃ jano vrajati sutarāṃ darpaṃ rājan ta eva tavāṅkuśāḥ // 508 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2778: śaśī divasadhūsaro galatayauvanā kāminī saro vigatavārijaṃ mukhamanakṣaraṃ svākṛteḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2779: prabhurdhanaparāyaṇaḥ satatadurgataḥ sajjano nṛpāṅgaṇagataḥ khalo manasi sapta śalyāni me // 509 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2780: atra śaśini dhūsare śalye śalyāntarāṇīti śobhanāśobhanayogaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2783: guṇau ca kriye ca guṇakriye ca guṇakriyāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2784: krameṇodāharaṇam-- vidalitasagalārikulaṃ tava balamidamabhavadāśu vimalaṃ ca /
GK16mamkpb_u:2785: prakhalamukhāni narādhipa malināni ca tāni jātāni // 510 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2786: ayamekapade tayā viyogaḥ priyayā copanataḥ suduḥsaho me /
GK16mamkpb_u:2789: patitaṃ ca mahīpatīndra teṣāṃ vapuṣi prasphuṭamāpadāṃ kaṭākṣaiḥ // 512 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2791: ityādeḥ “kṛpāṇapāṇiśva bhavān raṇakṣitau sasādhuvādāśva surāḥ surālaye';
GK16mamkpb_u:2797: ekaṃ vastu krameṇānekasmin bhavati kriyate vā sa paryāyaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2799: prāgarṇavasya hṛdaye vṛṣalakṣmaṇo 'tha kaṇṭhe 'dhunā vasasi vāci punaḥ khalānām // 513 //
GK16mamkpb_u:2807: anekamekasmin krameṇa bhavati kriyate vā so 'nyaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:2808: krameṇodāharaṇam-- madhurimaruciraṃ vacaḥ khalānāmamṛtamaho prathamaṃ pṛthu vyanakti /

GK16mamkpb_u:3105: śoṇaṃ bimboṣṭhakāntyā tvadarimṛgadṛśāmitvarīṇāmaraṇye rājan guñjāphalānāṃ sraja iti śabarā naiva hāraṃ haranti // 570 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3106: atra tadguṇamapekṣya bhrāntimatā prādurbhūtam tadāśrayeṇa ca tadguṇaḥ sacetasāṃ prabhūtacamatkṛtinimittamityanayoraṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3107: yathā vā jaṭābhābhirmābhiḥ karadhṛtakalaṅkākṣavalayo viyogivyāpatteriva kalitavairāgyaviśadaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3108: paripreṅkhattārāparikarakapālāṅkitatale śaśī bhasmāpāṇḍuḥ pitṛvana iva vyomni carati // 571 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3109: upamā rūpakam utprekṣā śleṣaśveti catvāro 'tra pūrvavat aṅgāṅgitayā pratīyante /
GK16mamkpb_u:3110: kalaṅka evākṣavalayamiti rūpakaparigrahe karadhṛtatvameva sādhakapramāṇatāṃ pratipadyate /
GK16mamkpb_u:3111: asya hi rūpakatve tirohitakalaṅkarūpam akṣavalayameva mukhyatayāvagamyate tasyaiva ca karagrahaṇayogyatāyāṃ sārvatrikī prasiddhiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3112: śleṣacchāyayā tu kalaṅkasya karadhāraṇam asadeva pratyāsacyā,
GK16mamkpb_u:3113: upacarya yojyateśaśāṅkena kevalaṃ kalaṅkasya mūrtyaiva, udvahanāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:3114: kalaṅko 'kṣavalayamiveti tu, apamāyāṃ kalaṅkasya, utkaṭatayā pratipattiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3115: na cāsya karadhṛtatvaṃ tacvato 'stīti mukhye 'pyupacāra eva śaraṇaṃ syāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:3117: yathā rājati taṭīyamabhihatadānavarāsātipātisārāvanadāḥ gajatā ca yūthamaviratadānavarā sātipāti sārā vanadā // 572 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3122_0: alaṃkārāṇāmekatra kamāveśe 'pi virodhāt na yatra yugapadavasthānam na caikatarasya
GK16mamkpb_u:3122_1: parigrahe sādhakam taditarasya vā parihāre bādhakamasti yainaikatara eva parigṛhyeta
GK16mamkpb_u:3122_2: sa niśvayābhāvarūpo dvitīyaḥ saṃkaraḥ samuccayena saṃkarasyaivākṣepāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:3123: udāharaṇam-- jaha gahiro jaha raaṇaṇibbharo jaha a ṇimmalacchāo /
GK16mamkpb_u:3124: taha kiṃ vihiṇā eso sarasavāṇīo jalaṇihī ṇa kio // 573 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3125: atra samudre prastute viśeṣaṇasāmyādaprastutārthapratīteḥ kimasau samāsoktiḥ kim abdheraprastutasya mukhena kasyāpi tatsamaguṇatayā prastutasya pratīteḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:3132: etaditi vaktraṃ nirdiśya tadrūpāropavaśāt rūpakam atha vā tayoḥ samuccayavivakṣāyāṃ dīpakam atha vā tulyayogitā kimupradeṣasamaye viśeṣaṇasāmyādānanasyāvagatau samākoktiḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:3135: yatra tu nyāyadoṣayoranyatarasyāvatāraḥ, tatra, ekatarasya niśvayāt na saṃśayaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3136: nyāyaśva sādhakatvam anukūlatā doṣo 'pi bādhakatvaṃ pratikūlatā /
GK16mamkpb_u:3137: tatra saubhāgyaṃ vitanoti vaktraśaśino jyotsneva hāsadyutiḥ // 575 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3141: ityūpamāyāḥ sādhakam śaśinā tu na tathā pratikūleti rūpakaṃ prati tasyā abādhakatā /
GK16mamkpb_u:3143: ityātrāparatvamindoranuguṇaṃ na tu vaktrasya pratikūlamiti rūpakasya sādhakatāṃ pratipadyate na tūpamāyā bādhakatām /
GK16mamkpb_u:3145: ityatra punarāliṅganamupamāṃ nirasyati sadṛśaṃ prati parapreyasīprayuktasyāliṅganasyāsaṃbhavāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:3146: pādāmbujaṃ bhavatu no vijayāya mañju- majjīraśijjitamanoharamambikāyāḥ // 578 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3147_0: ityatra mañjīraśiñjitam ambuje pratikūlam asaṃbhavāditi rūpakasya bādhakam na tu
GK16mamkpb_u:3147_1: pāde 'nukūlamityupamāyāḥ sādhakamamidhīyate vidhyupamardino bādhakasya tadapekṣayotkaṭatvena pratipatteḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3153: eva pade sphuṭatayā yat ubhāvapi śabdārthālaṃkārau vyavasthāṃ samāsādayataḥ so 'pyaparaḥ saṃkaraḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3160: ekapadapratipādyatayā ca vyavasthitatvāttriprakatāra eva saṃkaro vyākṛtaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3161: prakārāntareṇa tu na śakyo vyākartum ānantyāttatprabhedānāmiti pratipāditāḥ śabdārthomayagatatvena traividhyajuṣo 'laṃkārāḥ //
GK16mamkpb_u:3162: kutaḥ punareṣa niyamo yadeteṣāṃ tulye 'pi kāvyaśobhātiśayahetutve kaśvidalaṃkāraḥ śabdasya kaśvidarthasya kaśviccobhayasya,
GK16mamkpb_u:3163: iti cet uktamatra yathā kāvye doṣaguṇālaṃkārāṇāṃ śabdārthobhayagatatvena vyavakthāyāmanvayavyatirekāveva prabhavataḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:3164: nimittāntarasyābhāvāt tataśva yo 'laṃkāro yadīyānvayavyatirekāvanuvidhatte sa tadalaṃkāro viyavasthāpyate, iti /
GK16mamkpb_u:3165: evaṃ ca yathā punaruktavadābhāsaḥ paraṃparitarūpakaṃ cobhayorbhāvābhāvānuvidhāyitayā,
GK16mamkpb_u:3167: arthasya tu tatra vaicitryam utkaṭatayā pratibhāsate,
GK16mamkpb_u:3169: yo 'laṃkāro yadāśritaḥ sa tadalaṃkāra ityapi kalpanāyām anvayavyatirekāveva samāśrayitavyau /
GK16mamkpb_u:3175: tathāhi--anuprāsasya prasiddhyabhāvo vaiphalyaṃ vṛttivirodha iti ye trayo doṣāḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:3176_0: te prasiddhiviruddhatām apuṣṭārthatvam pratikūlavarṇatāṃ ca yathākramaṃ na vyatikrāmanti
GK16mamkpb_u:3176_1: tatsvabhāvatvāt krameṇodāharaṇam-- cakrī cakrārapaṅktiṃ harirapi ca haran dhūrjaṭirdhūrdhvajāgrā-
GK16mamkpb_u:3177: raṃhaḥ saṃghaḥ surāṇāṃ jagadupakṛtaye nityayuktasya yasya stauti prītiprasanno 'nvahamahimaruceḥ so 'vatātsyandano vaḥ // 580 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3179: anuprāsānurodhenaiva kṛtā na purāṇetihāsādiṣu tathā pratīteti prasiddhivirodhaḥ //
GK16mamkpb_u:3181: yadi sallīlollāpini gacchasi tat kiṃ tvadīyaṃ me // 581 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3184: atra vācyasya vicintyamānaṃ na kiṃcidapi cārutvaṃ pratīyate,
GK16mamkpb_u:3190: yathā bhujaṅgamasyeva maṇiḥ sadambhā grāhāvakīrṇeva nadī sadambhāḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3191: durantatāṃ nirṇayato 'pi jantoḥ karṣanti cetaḥ prasabhaṃ sadambhāḥ // 583 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3192: upamāyām upamānasya jātipramāṇagatanyūnatvam adhikatā vā tādṛśī,
GK16mamkpb_u:3194: dharṇāśraye tu nyūnādhikatve yathākramaṃ hīnapadatvamadhikapadatvaṃ ca na vyabhicarataḥ //
GK16mamkpb_u:3195: krameṇodāharaṇam-- caṇḍālairiva yuṣmābhiḥ sāhasaṃ paramaṃ kṛtam // 584 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3204: atropamānasya mauñjīsthānīyastaḍillakṣaṇo dharmaḥ kenāpi padena na pratipādita iti hīnapadatvam //
GK16mamkpb_u:3205: sa pītavāsāḥ pragṛhītaśārṅgo manojñamīmaṃ vapurāpa kṛṣṇaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3209: upamānopameyayoḥ sādhāraṇaṃ cet dharmamanyarūpaṃ kuryāt tadā,
GK16mamkpb_u:3210: ekatarasyaiva taddharmasamanvayāvagateḥ saviśeṣaṇasyaiva tasyopamānatvamupameyatvaṃ vā pratīyamānena dharmeṇa pratīyate,
GK16mamkpb_u:3212: yathā-- cintāratnamiva cayuto 'si karato dhiṅbhandabhāgyasya me // 590 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3214: yatra tu nānātve 'pi liṅgavacanayoḥ sāmānyābhidhāyi padaṃ svarupabhedaṃ nāpadyate na tatraitaddūṣaṇāvatāraḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:3220: dadhate sma parāṃ śobhāṃ tadīyā vibhramā iva // 593 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3221: kālapuruṣavidhyādibhede 'pi na tathā pratītiraskhalitarūpatayā viśrāntimāsādayatītyasāvapi bhagnaprakramatayaiva vyāptaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3222: yathā atithiṃ nāma kākutsthāt putramāpa kumudvatī /
GK16mamkpb_u:3224: atra cetanā prasādamāpnoti na punarāpeti kālabhedaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3227: atra latā vibhrājate na tu vibhrājase,
GK16mamkpb_u:3231: ityādau ca gaṅgā pravahati na tu pravahatu, iti, apravṛttapravartanātmano vidheḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3233: nanu samānam uccāritaṃ pratīyamānaṃ vā dharmāntaramupādāya paryavasitāyām upamāyām upameyasya prakṛtadhamābisaṃbandhānna kaśvitkālādibhedo 'sti /
GK16mamkpb_u:3237: iti tatra yudhiṣṭhira iva satyavādyayaṃ satyaṃ vadatīti pratipatsyāmahe /
GK16mamkpb_u:3238: satyāvādī satyaṃ vadatīti ca na paunaruktayam āśaṅkanīyam raipoṣaṃ puṣṇātītivat yudhiṣṭhira iva satyavadanena satyavādyayamityarthāvagamāt /
GK16mamkpb_u:3239: satyametat kiṃ tu sthiteṣu prayogeṣu samarthanamidaṃ na tu sarvathā niravadyam prastutavastupratītivyāghātāditi sacetasa evātra pramāṇam //
GK16mamkpb_u:3242: atra kāvsya śaśinā, arthānāṃ ca raśmibhiḥ sādharmyaṃ kutrāpi na pratītamityanucitārthatvam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3245: atrāpi jvalantyo 'mbudhārāḥ sūryamaṇḍalāt niṣpatantyo na saṃbhavantītyupanibadhyamāno 'rtho 'naucityameva puṣṇāti //
GK16mamkpb_u:3246_0: utprekṣāyāmapi saṃbhāvanaṃ dhruvevādaya eva śabdā vaktuṃ sahante na yathāśabdo 'pi
GK16mamkpb_u:3246_1: kevalasyāsya sādharmyameva pratipādayituṃ paryāptatvāt tasya cāsyāmavivakṣitatvāditi
GK16mamkpb_u:3249: utprekṣitamapi tācvikena rupeṇa parivarjitatvāt nirupākhyaprakhyam tatsamarthanāya yat arthāntaranyāsopādānam tat ālokhyamiva gaganatale 'tyantamasamīcīnamiti nirviṣayatvametasya,
GK16mamkpb_u:3251: yathā divākarādrakṣati yo guhāsu līnaṃ divā bhītamivāndhakāram /
GK16mamkpb_u:3252: kṣudre 'pi nūnaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapanne prapanne mamatvamuccaiḥ śirasāmatīva // 600 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3253: atrācetanasya tamaso divākarāttrāsa eva na saṃbhavatīti kuta eva tatprayojitamadriṇā paritrāṇam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3254: saṃbhāvitena tu rūteṇa pratibhāsamānasyāsya na kācidanupapattiravataratīti vyartha eva tatsamarthanāyāṃ yatnaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3256: upamānaviśeṣaṃ prakāśayatīti tasyātra punarupādāne prayojanābhāvāt anupādeyatvaṃ yat tat apuṣṭārthatvaṃ punaruktaṃ vā doṣaḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3257: yathā spṛśati tigmarucau kakubhaḥ karairdayitayeva vijṛmbhitatāpayā /
GK16mamkpb_u:3259: atra tigmaruceḥ kakubhāṃ ca yathā sadṛśaviśeṣaṇavaśena vyaktiviśeṣaparigraheṇa ca nāyakatayā nāyikātvena ca vyaktiḥ,
GK16mamkpb_u:3260: tathā grīṣmadivasaśriyo 'pi pratīnāyikātvena bhaviṣyatīti kiṃ dayitayeti svaśabdopādānena //
GK16mamkpb_u:3262: yatropamānasyopādānamantareṇa sādhāraṇeṣvapi viśeṣaṇeṣu na tathā pratītiḥ /
GK16mamkpb_u:3266: aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmapi upameyam anayaiva rītyā pratītaṃ na punaḥ prayogeṇa kadarthatāṃ neyam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3267: yathā āhūteṣu vihaṃgameṣu maśako nāyān puro vāryate madhyevāridhi vāvasaṃstṛṇamaṇirdhatte maṇīnāṃ rucam /
GK16mamkpb_u:3268: khadyoto 'pi na kampate pracalituṃ madhye 'pi tejasvināṃ dhik sāmānyamacetanaṃ prabhumivānāmṛṣṭatacvāntaram // 603 //
GK16mamkpb_u:3269: a6, acetanasya prabhoraprastutaviśiṣṭasāmānyadvāreṇābhivyaktau na yuktameva punaḥ kathanam //
GK16mamkpb_u:3274: ityeṣa mārgo viduṣāṃ vibhinno 'pyabhinnarūpaḥ pratimāsate yat /
GK16mamkpb_u:3275: na tadvicitraṃ yadamutra samyagvinirmitā saṃghaṭanaiva hetuḥ //1//
